comment.author: 18753752@N00
comment._content: The Great Dayton Flood occurred in March 1913. It's still the greatest natural in Ohio history. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great_Dayton_Flood

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: We'll add March 1913 to the source data. Thanks!

comment.author: 47747445@N04
comment._content: My mother's parents and grandparents were rescued by boat, they lived on Dekalb Street right by the river. This is not them, but I can feel connected as they were saved the same way and lived to give birth to her.
